programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: Huang Ying Zi has a gathering at her house to celebrate Jiang Yi's new job. A power outage occurs and they recall the time there was a power outage when they were 18 years old.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: Huang Ying Zi knows that Ding Ye graduated from the school that Zhuang Yuan teaches at. To understand Ding Ye on a deeper level, she finds Zhuang Yuan for help.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Chen Shi realises that Lin Li is ill and requires surgery; he feels guilty and is unable to abandon her. News of Yu Ting and Chen Shi's relationship surfaces at the tuition centre, leaving Yu Ting with no choice but to resign. Yu Ting asks Chen Shi about the future plans and he tells her that he cannot abandon Lin Li right now as she is ill, leaving Yu Ting disappointed.

programme.title: Gold Medal Protection
programme.desc: Tong Song, a man disabled in both legs, is the founder of the Maodun Security Company whose primary business is safeguarding clients' personal and financial security. One day, they receive a three-day anonymous assignment to protect one of his team member's sister. As she starts experiencing a series of accidents, Tong Song suspects these incidents are not coincidental.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Despite living with Spinal Muscular Atrophy, Ben Lou transcends physical limitations through his extraordinary brilliance in mathematics and physics. He shares his inspiring journey, showcasing how resilience and intellect have turned adversity into a catalyst for groundbreaking innovation.

programme.title: Boiling Pot
programme.desc: Noelle visits the Chengdu Taste and Beijing Restaurant to experience the most authentic Sichuan flavor and Beijing snacks.

programme.title: Flaming Cloud
programme.desc: Above the clouds lies a celestial casino where the Gods of heaven bet on the sorrows and joys of Earth for their own amusement. One day, they choose a newborn baby boy, Sangui, and curse him with a strange affliction: everyone he kisses falls into a deep slumber, and only true love can break the spell.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: The Queen Mother and Weng Zong Shen discuss the issus of stripping Xiao Qi of his military power.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Zhao Qi is ambushed by Helan Zhen in the valley and framed for the assassination of Zi Long.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne
programme.desc: Ho-yee’s secretary accepts a bribe from Chi-bun and then quickly leaves Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne
programme.desc: Hiu-ling gradually sides with Chi-bun as Chi-bun influences her.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: Jiang Yi, aiming to mend fences between Huang Ying Zi and Fang Ming Yu, and Huang Ying Zi trying to fulfill Zhuang Yuan's wishes, both coincidentally come up with the idea of a New Year's gift exchange party.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: While interviewing Ding Ye, Huang Ying Zi sees Lan Yi Fei's father, Lan Bin, who has been missing for many years. Huang Ying Zi wants to help Lan Yi Fei find her father.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Yu Ting is pregnant; unable to contact Chen Shi, she waits for him near his house. She tells Chen Shi and Lin Li about her pregnancy, leaving them shocked. Lin Li gives the divorce documents to Chen Shi, asking for his signature as she knows that the marriage cannot be salvaged. Si Yuan is unable to accept the fact that her parents are getting a divorced.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Lin Li resigns and decides to move back to her mother's home. Si Yuan feels helpless when Lin Li persuades her to accept Yu Ting. Lin Li bumps into Dong Sheng at Li Jiao's void deck, causing Dong Sheng to feel awkward. Fortunately, Lin Li is unaware that the guy she spent the night with at the hotel is Dong Sheng. Dong Sheng is secretly delighted to find out that they are going to be housemates.

programme.desc: Above the clouds lies a celestial casino where the Gods of heaven bet on the sorrows and joys of Earth for their own amusement. One day, they choose a newborn baby boy, Sangui, and curse him with a strange affliction: everyone he kisses falls into a deep slumber, and only true love can break the spell.

programme.desc: Noelle visits the Lunasia Dim Sum House to learn how to make a beautiful hargow and enjoy a traditional Cantonese tea brunch.
